document.full_text: fifa's ethics committee cleared president sepp blatter of any wrongdoing as two of soccer's most senior officials were suspended on sunday in the worst corruption scandal to blight the sport's governing body.
document.title: blatter cleared, top fifa officials suspended
lines_and_colors: fifa's ethics committee cleared president sepp blatter of any wrongdoing as two of soccer's most senior officials were suspended on sunday in the worst corruption scandal to blight the sport's governing body.
